extension.summary: Auto-configure IPTV channels based on location
extension.description: Automatically detects your location and downloads free IPTV channels for your country. Includes EPG guide data and configures PVR IPTV Simple Client addon.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2026-01-16) - Initial release - Auto-detect location by IP - Download country-specific channels - Merge multiple playlists - Remove duplicates - Download EPG guide - Auto-configure PVR IPTV Simple
